do like this:
1. unpack the rar 
2. mount the image file and install
3. explore the "image" dvd and copy the files in the vitality folder (exe-file and euro file) to your folder where you have the game
4. to get an key for the game open the nfo-file in the vitality folder with wordpad and you will found som keys there for the game
